materials.name: Plastic Bottle
materials.eco_tip: Empty, rinse, and place in the recycling bin. Remove the cap if your local program requests it.
materials.notes: Check local guidelines for labels and caps.

materials.name: Aluminum Can
materials.eco_tip: Rinse and crush if space is limited; place in the recycling bin.
materials.notes: Highly recyclable with strong market value.

materials.name: Banana Peel
materials.eco_tip: Add to your compost bin or pile.
materials.notes: Cut into smaller pieces to speed up composting.

materials.name: Cardboard
materials.eco_tip: Flatten boxes to save space before recycling.
materials.notes: Remove tape or plastic if possible.
